content: eyes it is 2 row high and 3 stitches wide it helps to locate the center before sewing the mouth in add blush with a permanent fabric marker don t forget to practice with this first just under the eyes strawberry pal by brilliantbutton ©2024 kalene gardner 4 return to the body change to green round 10 single_crochet decrease 16 round 11 flo sl in body ch3 sl in first chain sl in body x 8 8 petals note add stitch markers in the back loops if you need to later the back loops will be worked in round 12 work in blo left from round 10 decrease around 8 pause to stuff round 13 sl chain 4 3 single_crochet in chain starting in second from hook sl in the body tie off with long tail and sew shut work through the stitch at the base of the stem to sew it shut strawberry pal by brilliantbutton ©2024 kalene gardner 5 i hope you enjoyed the pattern if you did please consider leaving a review it would really help my shop find us on your socials for more fun @brilliantbuttoncrochet keep smiling kalene gardner brilliant button strawberry pal by brilliantbutton ©2024 kalene gardner
